name: Sleep
prompt: A cozy bedroom with unmade bed, soft pillows, dim lighting, peaceful sleep scene, anime pixel art style
effect: Restore 60 Sleep and 10 Health. Takes 8 hours.
flavor_text: "In dreams, we find the peace that daylight steals."

name: Quick Nap
prompt: Person curled up on couch with blanket, afternoon sunlight through window, brief rest, anime pixel art style
effect: Restore 25 Sleep and 5 Mental. Takes 2 hours.
flavor_text: Sometimes twenty minutes can save your sanity.

name: Rest in Bed
prompt: Person lying in bed staring at ceiling, restless, unable to sleep, melancholic mood, anime pixel art style
effect: Restore 10 Sleep but lose 5 Mental. Takes 1 hour. Requires Bed.
flavor_text: The mind races while the body lies still.

name: Cook Meal
prompt: Small kitchen with steam rising from cooking pot, fresh ingredients, warm homemade meal, anime pixel art style
effect: Restore 50 Food, 15 Health, and 10 Mental. Takes 1.5 hours. Requires Kitchen.
flavor_text: "The smell of garlic and onions is the first step back to humanity."

name: Grab Snacks
prompt: Bag of chips and instant noodles, unhealthy snacks scattered on table, quick convenience food, anime pixel art style
effect: Restore 20 Food but lose 5 Health. Takes 15 minutes. Requires Fridge.
flavor_text: Empty calories for an empty soul.

name: Order Delivery
prompt: Phone with food delivery app, takeout containers, guilt about ordering again, anime pixel art style
effect: Restore 40 Food but lose 10 Mental. Takes 30 minutes. Requires Phone.
flavor_text: "Hello, yes, the usual please... again."

name: Drink Water
prompt: Glass of clear water, simple hydration, basic self-care, clean and refreshing, anime pixel art style
effect: Restore 5 Health. Instant.
flavor_text: The simplest acts of self-care are often the hardest.

name: Take Shower
prompt: Steamy bathroom, hot shower running, feeling refreshed and clean, self-care moment, anime pixel art style
effect: Restore 20 Health and 15 Mental. Takes 45 minutes. Requires Bathroom.
flavor_text: Hot water washes away more than just dirt.

name: Basic Hygiene
prompt: Bathroom sink with toothbrush and soap, basic morning routine, minimal self-care, anime pixel art style
effect: Restore 10 Health and 5 Mental. Takes 15 minutes. Requires Bathroom.
flavor_text: Small steps toward feeling human again.

name: Skip Hygiene
prompt: Unkempt person avoiding mirror, messy hair, neglecting self-care, depression mood, anime pixel art style
effect: Lose 5 Health and 10 Mental. Instant.
flavor_text: The mirror judges, so I look away.

name: Watch Shows
prompt: Person on couch watching TV, colorful screen glow, entertainment escape, relaxed viewing, anime pixel art style
effect: Restore 10 Mental but lose 5 Sleep. Takes 2 hours. Requires TV.
flavor_text: Other people's stories help me forget my own.

name: Binge Series
prompt: Person surrounded by snack wrappers, multiple episodes playing, obsessive binge watching, anime pixel art style
effect: Restore 15 Mental but lose 10 Health and 15 Sleep. Takes 6 hours. Requires TV.
flavor_text: "Just one more episode..." she said, twelve hours ago.

name: Channel Surf
prompt: Remote control clicking rapidly, static TV screens, mindless channel surfing, boredom, anime pixel art style
effect: Lose 5 Mental. Takes 1 hour. Requires TV.
flavor_text: Click. Nothing. Click. Nothing. Click. Still nothing.

name: Watch News
prompt: Depressing news broadcast on TV, worried person watching, negative world events, anxiety inducing, anime pixel art style
effect: Lose 15 Mental. Takes 1 hour. Requires TV.
flavor_text: "Breaking News: Everything is terrible, and here's why."

name: Play Games
prompt: Gaming controller in hands, exciting video game on screen, immersive gameplay, focused gaming, anime pixel art style
effect: Restore 20 Mental but lose 10 Sleep. Takes 3 hours. Requires Game Console.
flavor_text: In digital worlds, I can be the hero.

name: Gaming Marathon
prompt: Person gaming through night, multiple controllers, energy drinks, obsessive all-day gaming session, anime pixel art style
effect: Restore 25 Mental but lose 20 Health, 25 Sleep, and 15 Food. Takes 12 hours. Requires Game Console.
flavor_text: Day and night blur together in the blue glow.

name: Retro Games
prompt: Old gaming console, retro pixel games on screen, nostalgic gaming session, classic controllers, anime pixel art style
effect: Restore 15 Mental. Takes 2 hours. Requires Game Console.
flavor_text: Simpler times, simpler games, simpler me.

name: Rage Quit
prompt: Angry person throwing controller, game over screen, frustration and rage, gaming failure, anime pixel art style
effect: Lose 20 Mental. Takes 30 minutes. Requires Game Console.
flavor_text: "This game is stupid!" *throws controller across room*

name: Browse Internet
prompt: Person at computer desk, multiple browser tabs open, casual internet browsing, blue screen glow, anime pixel art style
effect: Restore 5 Mental. Takes 2 hours. Requires Computer.
flavor_text: Seventeen tabs open, zero productivity achieved.

name: Social Media
prompt: Social media feeds on screen, comparing to others' posts, FOMO and jealousy, depressing social comparison, anime pixel art style
effect: Lose 15 Mental. Takes 1.5 hours. Requires Computer.
flavor_text: Everyone else's highlight reel vs. my behind-the-scenes.

name: Online Shopping
prompt: Shopping website on computer, cart full of items, retail therapy, temporary happiness from buying, anime pixel art style
effect: Restore 10 Mental. Takes 2 hours. Requires Computer.
flavor_text: Maybe this purchase will fill the void.

name: Watch Videos
prompt: Video streaming on computer, endless video recommendations, entertainment rabbit hole, anime pixel art style
effect: Restore 8 Mental but lose 5 Sleep. Takes 3 hours. Requires Computer.
flavor_text: The algorithm knows me better than I know myself.

name: Download Everything
prompt: Computer with countless downloaded files, digital hoarding, obsessive collecting behavior, cluttered desktop, anime pixel art style
effect: Lose 5 Mental. Takes 4 hours. Requires Computer.
flavor_text: I'll watch this someday. I swear I'll watch this someday.

name: Ignore Calls
prompt: Ringing phone being ignored, person covering ears, avoiding social contact, isolation, anime pixel art style
effect: Lose 10 Mental. Instant. Triggered by Phone Ring event.
flavor_text: If I don't answer, the problem doesn't exist.

name: Check Messages
prompt: Phone screen with unread messages, anxiety about responding, social pressure notifications, anime pixel art style
effect: Lose 5 Mental. Takes 30 minutes. Requires Phone.
flavor_text: Twelve unread messages. Twelve points of anxiety.

name: Answer Call
prompt: Person nervously answering phone, social interaction, breaking isolation, emotionally draining conversation, anime pixel art style
effect: Restore 15 Mental but lose 10 Sleep. Takes 1 hour. Triggered by Phone Ring event.
flavor_text: "Hello? Yes, I'm still alive. Barely."

name: Send Message
prompt: Typing message on phone, careful word choice, small social connection, hesitant communication, anime pixel art style
effect: Restore 5 Mental. Takes 15 minutes. Requires Phone.
flavor_text: Type. Delete. Type again. Delete. Send 'ok'.

name: Ignore Door
prompt: Person hiding from door knock, visitor silhouette outside, avoiding human contact, fear of interaction, anime pixel art style
effect: Lose 15 Mental. Instant. Triggered by Door Knock event.
flavor_text: Shhh. Maybe they'll think no one's home.

name: Peek Outside
prompt: Person carefully peeking through curtains, outside world visible, curiosity mixed with fear, anime pixel art style
effect: Lose 5 Mental. Instant. Requires Window.
flavor_text: The world continues without me.

name: Hide
prompt: Person crouched in corner hiding, visitor outside door, extreme social avoidance, paralyzing fear, anime pixel art style
effect: Lose 20 Mental. Takes 30 minutes. Triggered by Door Knock event.
flavor_text: Breathe quietly. Count to one hundred. They'll leave.

name: Crash Sleep
prompt: Person collapsed from exhaustion, falling asleep anywhere, extreme fatigue, uncontrolled sleep, anime pixel art style
effect: Restore 80 Sleep but lose 10 Health. Takes 12 hours. Available when Sleep is critically low.
flavor_text: The body takes what the mind refused to give.

name: Panic Eating
prompt: Person stress eating, surrounded by empty food containers, compulsive eating behavior, emotional eating crisis, anime pixel art style
effect: Restore 60 Food but lose 15 Health and 10 Mental. Takes 1 hour. Available when Food is critically low.
flavor_text: If I can't fill the emptiness inside, I'll fill my stomach.

name: Hide Under Blanket
prompt: Person completely covered by blanket, hiding from world, total withdrawal, makeshift safety cocoon, anime pixel art style
effect: Lose 5 Mental but restore 10 Sleep. Takes 3 hours. Available when Mental is low.
flavor_text: Under here, the world can't hurt me.

name: Call for Help
prompt: Person desperately reaching for phone, calling for help, breakthrough moment, seeking support, anime pixel art style
effect: Restore 30 Mental and 10 Health. Takes 2 hours. Available during any critical crisis.
flavor_text: "Help. Please. I can't do this alone anymore."

name: Mental Breakdown
prompt: Person having mental breakdown, overwhelming emotions, complete emotional collapse, crisis moment, anime pixel art style
effect: Lose 50 Mental and 20 Health. Takes 4 hours. Available when Mental is critically low.
flavor_text: The dam breaks. Everything floods out at once.

name: Morning Anxiety
prompt: Person waking up anxious, morning sunlight through window, dreading the day ahead, morning anxiety, anime pixel art style
effect: Lose 20 Mental. Takes 1 hour. Available between 6-9 AM.
flavor_text: Another day. Another chance to fail.

name: 3AM Thoughts
prompt: Person awake at 3AM, dark room, existential thoughts, late night mental spiral, insomnia and dread, anime pixel art style
effect: Lose 25 Mental and 20 Sleep. Takes 2 hours. Available between 2-5 AM.
flavor_text: 3 AM: When the universe whispers all its cruelest truths.

name: Sunday Scaries
prompt: Sunday evening anxiety, calendar showing Monday, weekend ending dread, anticipating work week, anime pixel art style
effect: Lose 15 Mental. Takes 1 hour. Available Sunday evenings.
flavor_text: Sunday evening: The weekend's funeral service.

name: They're Watching
prompt: Person looking paranoid, security cameras everywhere, feeling watched, paranoid delusion, surveillance anxiety, anime pixel art style
effect: Lose 30 Mental. Takes 1 hour. Randomly generated event.
flavor_text: The cameras blink in morse code. They know I know.

name: Secret Genius
prompt: Person imagining themselves as genius, grandiose fantasy, delusions of grandeur, superiority complex, anime pixel art style
effect: Restore 20 Mental. Takes 2 hours. Randomly generated event.
flavor_text: They'll understand my brilliance... eventually.

name: Different Life
prompt: Person daydreaming about different life, fantasy world overlay, escapist imagination, alternate reality, anime pixel art style
effect: Restore 10 Mental. Takes 1.5 hours. Randomly generated event.
flavor_text: In another life, I'm happy. In another life, I matter.
